page.title: 11TIBBERTON AREA CANAL LEISURE
page.content: {TOURISM}-The canal boat company in Worcester have been operating for 3 years in this area.They own 25 boats. {CUSTOMERS}-People hire boats from all over the world,but the majority are from English speaking nations. {FACILITIES}-The average facilities are central heating,hot and cold water,a stereo,two toilets,a television,a cooker and washing facilities.Others cost extra.The average cost for a four berth,range from Â£176-Â£350,winter to summer respectively. {RULES}-The boats must not be used for business.There is training for inexperienced boaters.You can moor anywhere along the canal and boaters are provided with two metal spikes. There are no plans for commercial transportation on this stretch.
